meanings.sent1: The farmer was a skilled yielder of crops.
meanings.sent2: The factory machine was a reliable yielder of products.
meanings.sent3: The yielder of jokes at the party kept everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: She was a yielder of kindness, spreading joy wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The yielder of solutions always had a way to fix any problem.
